item.title: AMD 首席执行官苏丽莎已准备好成为人工智能的焦点
item.description:
芯片制造商的高管加入竞争对手，成为新兴技术的传播者

。【原文：

Chipmaker’s top executive joins rivals as an evangelist for the emerging technology

】

item.title: 法国初创公司 Elyse Energy 为海事和可持续航空燃料项目融资 1.2 亿欧元
item.description: Elyse Energy 是一家紧密控股的法国清洁技术初创公司，该公司筹集了约 1.2 亿欧元（1.26 亿美元）的资金，用于生产绿色燃料，供化工、航运和航空业使用。【原文：Elyse Energy, a closely held French clean-tech startup, raised about €120 million ($126 million) to produce green fuels for use in chemicals, shipping and aviation.】

item.title: 桑吉夫-古普塔的庞大钢铁帝国面临分崩离析的风险
item.description: 在过去的三年里，钢铁大亨桑吉夫-古普塔（Sanjeev Gupta）完成了企业生存的非凡壮举。【原文：For the past three years, steel tycoon Sanjeev Gupta has performed an extraordinary feat of corporate survival.】

item.title: 勒庞重燃预算协议希望，法国债券上涨
item.description: 法国债券涨幅扩大，因为人们希望该国能够设法结束数月来有关政府财政的政治纷争，这比许多投资者预期的要早。【原文：French bonds extended gains amid hopes the country will manage to put an end to months of political wrangling over government finances sooner than many investors had expected.】

item.title: 谢菲尔德联队是最新一家同意美国收购的足球俱乐部
item.description: 一家美国财团已同意收购谢菲尔德联队，这是英超联赛之外最大的英格兰足球队之一。【原文：An American consortium has agreed to buy Sheffield United, one of the biggest English football teams outside the Premier League.】

item.title: 勒庞认为，如果马克龙放宽债务路径，法国预算将在数周内出台
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞说，只要下一任总理准备以更慢的速度缩小赤字，法国就能在 "几周内 "克服政府垮台的问题，完成预算。【原文：Marine Le Pen said France can overcome government collapse to deliver a budget in “a matter of weeks” — so long as the next prime minister is prepared to narrow the deficit more slowly.】

item.title: 韩国财政部长称经济衰退担忧 "过度
item.description: 韩国财政部长称，对韩国明年将陷入经济衰退的担忧是 "过度的"，他淡化了本周错误的戒严令将对经济或市场产生持久影响的观点。【原文：South Korea’s finance minister says fears the nation will slide into a recession next year are “excessive,” as he played down the view that this week’s bungled martial law decree will have a lasting impact on the economy or markets.】

item.title: 欧盟防长提出基于北约目标的联合债务融资计划
item.description: 欧盟国防部长提出了一个新的军费联合借贷机制，作为该集团在未来十年内寻求约 5,000 亿欧元（5,270 亿美元）安全资金计划的一部分。【原文：The European Union’s defense chief floated a new joint borrowing mechanism for military spending as part of the bloc’s plan to seek some €500 billion ($527 billion) for security over the next decade.】

item.title: 美国贸易赤字从两年多高点收窄
item.description: 由于企业减少了消费品和商业设备的进口，美国 10 月份的贸易赤字从两年多来的高点有所收窄。【原文：The US trade deficit narrowed in October from a more than two-year high as companies dialed back imports of consumer goods and business equipment.】

item.title: 美国感恩节周申请失业救济人数升至一个月新高
item.description: 在包括感恩节假期在内的一周内，美国失业救济金申请人数升至一个月来的最高点。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose to the highest in a month during a week that included the Thanksgiving holiday.】

item.title: 欧盟主席里贝拉誓言打击中国在清洁技术领域的主导地位
item.description: 欧盟新任竞争主管警告说，欧盟应防范中国主导该集团清洁技术市场的企图，并确保中国的出口不会摧毁当地的竞争对手。【原文：The European Union should guard against Chinese attempts to dominate the bloc’s clean-tech market and make sure its exports aren’t destroying local rivals, the bloc’s new competition chief warned.】

item.title: 关税之争迫在眉睫，加拿大对美贸易顺差缩小
item.description: 加拿大与美国的贸易顺差帮助这个北方国家避免了更严重的整体赤字，在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收破坏性关税之际，这凸显了其最大贸易伙伴的重要性。【原文：Canada’s trade surplus with the US helped the northern nation avoid a deeper overall deficit, underscoring the importance of its biggest trading partner as President-elect Donald Trump threatens crippling tariffs.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚检察官开始调查干预选举指控
item.description: 罗马尼亚开始调查第一轮总统选举中可能存在的干预行为，结果一名鲜为人知的亲俄候选人出人意料地获胜，并引发了一场前所未有的政治危机。【原文：Romania started an investigation into potential meddling in the first round of the presidential election that resulted in the surprise win of a little known pro-Russia candidate and triggered an unprecedented political crisis.】

item.title: 股票与加密货币的杠杆化博弈，华尔街的 "Go-Go时代 "正在形成
item.description: 这是华尔街快速增长的高风险 ETF 文件阵容中最新推出的高刺激产品：杠杆产品一举增加了对大盘股和加密货币的风险敞口，让交易者有机会加倍投资今年表现最好的两种资产。【原文：It’s the latest high-octane offering from Wall Street’s rapidly growing line-up of risky ETF filings: Leveraged products that amp up exposures to large-cap stocks and crypto in one fell swoop – giving traders a way to double down on two of this year’s best-performing assets.】

item.title: Latham & Watkins 将有两名高级交易律师回归
item.description: Latham & Watkins LLP 律师事务所将重新聘用奥利弗-塞勒（Oliver Seiler）和戴维-拉特（David Rath）。【原文：Law firm Latham & Watkins LLP is rehiring Oliver Seiler and David Rath, who left for rival White & Case LLP earlier this year.】

item.title: 顾客退却，休闲餐厅破产加速
item.description: TGI Friday's Inc.上个月申请破产时，这家休闲餐饮连锁店将原因归咎于销售下滑和收入缩水，因为顾客减少了消费。【原文：When TGI Friday’s Inc. filed for bankruptcy last month, the casual dining chain blamed declining sales and shrinking revenue as strained customers pulled back from spending.】

item.title: 亿万富翁格科的 XTX 公司向数学家的人工智能投入数百万美元
item.description: 亿万富翁亚历克斯-格科（Alex Gerko）的量化交易公司XTX Markets向一个新基金捐赠了920万美元，该基金旨在加速数学家对人工智能的应用。【原文：Billionaire Alex Gerko’s quantitative-trading firm XTX Markets has donated $9.2 million to a new fund that aims to accelerate the use of artificial intelligence by mathematicians.】

item.title: 北极熊称，SBB 股票在关键法庭案件审理前将有 80% 的上涨空间
item.description: 北极证券公司（Arctic Securities AS）的分析师认为，陷入困境的瑞典房东 SBB 的股价有可能从目前的交易水平上涨多达 80%，但这项投资 "仍然是勇敢者的投资"。【原文：The shares of troubled Swedish landlord SBB have the potential to rise as much as 80% from their current trading levels but the investment “remains one for the brave,” according to analysts at Arctic Securities AS.】

item.title: Sizewell C 基金谈判陷入僵局，英国寻求更多投资者
item.description: 英国政府正在与除现有核心竞标者之外的投资者进行谈判，以获得该国塞兹韦尔 C 核电厂的股份，同时继续商谈最终确定该项目的资金来源。【原文：The UK government is speaking with investors beyond the core group of existing bidders for a stake in the country’s Sizewell C nuclear plant as talks to finalize the project’s funding continue.】

item.title: 美国继承人即将获得 105 万亿美元的遗产意外之财
item.description:
股市和房价的上涨帮助许多美国老年人积累了大笔遗产，但继承遗产的人数比例仍然很小

。【原文：

Rising stock markets and home prices have helped many older Americans amass large estates, but the share of people who inherit money has remained small

】

item.title: Nvidia 同意在东南亚开设人工智能中心
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）创始人兼首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）签署了一项协议，将在越南开设人工智能研发中心，以加强该公司在东南亚的业务。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s founder and Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang signed a deal to open an artificial intelligence research and development center in Vietnam as the company steps up its presence in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 中国太阳能产业应效仿美国页岩气以缓解危机
item.description:
与其推行类似欧佩克（OPEC）的政策来控制产量和价格，这个陷入困境的行业不如精益求精。【原文：

The embattled sector would be better off getting lean than pursuing OPEC-like policies to control production and prices.

】

item.title: TikTok 寻求法院支持，特朗普暂缓美国禁令
item.description: TikTok 正在焦急地等待与即将实施的美国禁令有关的法律裁决，但首先...【原文：TikTok is anxiously awaiting a legal decision related to its upcoming US ban, but first…】

item.title: 欧佩克+推迟三个月恢复石油生产
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+将恢复石油生产的时间推迟了三个月，这是欧佩克第三次推迟这一行动，而原油价格却在过剩迫在眉睫的情况下挣扎。【原文：OPEC+ delayed the revival of its oil production by three months, delegates said, the third time it’s deferred the move while crude prices struggle amid a looming surplus.】

item.title: 阿布扎比统治家族购买 6,150 万英镑伦敦豪宅
item.description: 阿布扎比的统治家族阿勒纳哈扬（Al Nahyan）在伦敦荷兰公园（Holland Park）附近购买了一栋豪宅，成为该市今年最昂贵的住宅房产购买之一。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s ruling Al Nahyan family has bought a mansion in London’s Holland Park neighborhood, marking one of the city’s most expensive residential property purchases of the year.】

item.title: 长期失业为美国劳动力市场的韧性蒙上阴影
item.description: 我是迈克尔-萨索（Michael Sasso），亚特兰大的经济记者。今天我们关注美国的长期失业问题。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Michael Sasso, an economics reporter in Atlanta. Today we’re looking at long-term unemployment in the US. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 澳大利亚在全球贸易动荡中看到了机遇
item.description: 澳大利亚 10 月份的出口在液化天然气的推动下大幅增长，然而，由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普准备在 2025 年启动关税和潜在的贸易战，这个依赖中国的经济体面临着越来越不确定的前景。【原文：Australia’s exports jumped in October fueled by liquefied natural gas, yet this China-reliant economy faces an increasingly uncertain outlook as President-elect Donald Trump prepares to unleash tariffs and potentially trade wars in 2025.】

item.title: Baupost和Elliott豪赌私募股权基金的老化能源资产
item.description: 向私募股权公司拥有的难以出售的能源资产注入新资金的市场蓬勃发展，吸引了对冲基金和其他投资者的兴趣，导致了大赢和大亏。【原文：A booming market to inject fresh money into hard-to-sell energy assets owned by private equity firms is drawing interest from hedge funds and other investors, leading to big wins and steep losses.】

item.title: 德国 RWE 据称将启动 20 亿欧元的 Amprion 股份出售计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国最大的电力生产商 RWE AG 正在启动出售其在电网运营商 Amprion GmbH 少数股权的程序。【原文：Germany’s largest power producer RWE AG is starting a sale process for its minority stake in grid operator Amprion GmbH, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市波动的低迷使其成为 "球场上的球员
item.description: 波动率已跌穿底线，交易员们乐在其中。【原文：Volatility has fallen through the floor, and traders are enjoying it.】
